name: FeatureCardTwentyTwo
description: Feature section with TextBox header and fixed 2-column grid layout with horizontal feature cards and categories.

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

title.note: Feature title shown at text-3xl size, supports line-clamp-2

category.note: Array of category strings, displayed inline with bullet separators

media.note: Either imageSrc or videoSrc with optional imageAlt/videoAriaLabel

propsSchema.features: FeatureItem[] (required) - Array with id, category[], title, imageSrc/videoSrc
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTwentyTwo
    title="Our Features"
    description="Discover what makes us different."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        id: "1",
        title: "Advanced Analytics Dashboard",
        category: ["Analytics", "Data"],
        imageSrc: "/feature1.jpg"
      },
      {
        id: "2",
        title: "Real-time Collaboration Tools",
        category: ["Collaboration", "Team"],
        imageSrc: "/feature2.jpg"
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for featured listings with prominent display
Include relevant categories for each feature
dont: Do not use for simple icon-based features
